titles.title: Condemning the violence in Honduras and calling for the return of the duly elected President.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Rule of law and government transparency
Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: 7/8/2009--Introduced. Calls upon the leaders of the coup in Honduras to: (1) end their illegal seizure of power; (2) allow the president to return to his duly elected post; and (3) work within the rule of law to resolve differences with the elected government. Condemns the ongoing violence against peaceful demonstrators in Honduras.
